content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(12.5, 13.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric pole (position 12.5, 13.5)
- Electric pole (position 15.5, 15.5)
- Electric pole (position 11.5, 13.5)
- Additional electric poles at various positions ensuring power distribution.

### Copper plate factory at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: 13
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0) - Status: FULL_OUTPUT, Fuel: 6, Source: {'copper-ore': 8}
- Furnace (position 2.0, 2.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: 20

### Wooden chest at position(5.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position 5.5, 0.5) - Inventory: {'iron-plate': 160}

### Lab at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position 0.0, 0.0) - Status: NO_POWER, Research: automation

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure that you have the necessary ingredients available before attempting to use furnaces or other crafting entities. Check your inventory for required materials.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target area.

### Errors related to power supply
- Verify that all entities requiring power, such as labs, are connected to a power source. Check the status of electric poles and ensure they are functioning.
